Index.title: AgroVoiceAI
Index.desc: Meet AgroVoiceAI: Your virtual agronomy expert, revolutionizing farming with AI-driven insights and personalized guidance, ensuring every crop conversation yields success.

home.topic: Everything you need in a chatbot

crop.title: Crop Recommendations
crop.desc: Receive personalized crop recommendations tailored to your soil type, climate, and available resources, maximizing your yield potential.

pest.title: Pest Identification
pest.desc: Spot crop pests and diseases in user-uploaded images, get quick solutions.

weather.title: Weather Forecasting
weather.desc: Get precise weather updates for your location, perfect for planning your farm activities.

tips.title: Crop Management Tips
tips.desc: Get timely tips and best practices for crop cultivation, covering planting, fertilization, pruning, and harvesting.

market.title: Market Prices and Trends
market.desc: Get market prices and trends for agricultural commodities, aiding your sales decisions.

farming.title: Farming Q&A
farming.desc: Ask farming questions, get accurate answers instantly.

soil.title: Soil Health Assessment
soil.desc: Assess soil health, including soil testing recommendations and interpretation of soil test results, to optimize crop yield and sustainability.

sidebar.delete_chat: This will permanently delete your chat messages.
sidebar.delete_history: This will permanently delete your chat history.

name.title: Your Name
name.desc: Please enter your full name or a display name you are comfortable with.

image.title: Profile Picture (optional)
image.drag: Drag n drop an image file here

delete.title: Delete account
delete.desc: This will delete your account and all your data permanently.
delete.sub_desc: This will permanently delete your account.

bot.title: Additional Information (optional)
bot.desc: Please provide extra information for the chatbot to give more precise suggestions for your crop.
bot.placeholder: I like to "grow tomatoes" or I am "interested in organic farming" or tell about the current method carried out for your crops to get better suggestions.

pest.title: Pest Identification
pest.desc: Identify pests and diseases in your crops by uploading images.

onboarding.change_later: You can always change your details later.
onboarding.name: Name
